item.title: Arch安装KDE5
item.description: plasma desktop Install the plasma-meta meta-package or the plasma group. Alternatively, for a more minimal Plasma installation, install the plasma-desktop package. sddm The Simple Desktop Display Manager (SDDM) is the preferred display manager for KDE Plasma desktop. Install sddm 1 pacman -S sddm Configuration SDDM defaults to using systemd-logind for session management. 1 sddm --example-config > /etc/sddm.conf Loading sddm 1 2 systemctl start sddm systemctl enable sddm
